definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
to have no idea/to be unsure
see 心中無數|心中无数[xin1 zhong1 wu2 shu4]

sentences.english: Your willingness to sacrifice countless late nights consoling them?
sentences.chinese: 或者是因为你愿意花费无数的夜晚去安慰他们？

sentences.english: The text is a sane conversation with millions of participants.
sentences.chinese: 文本是一次与无数参与者的理智交谈。

sentences.english: The annual traditional festival Mid-Autumn Festival, countless lovers and eventually became dependents places.
sentences.chinese: 每年的中秋传统佳节，无数的有情人终成眷宿。

sentences.english: Butter lamps, together with the numerous pre-Buddhist worship.
sentences.chinese: 连同无数的酥油灯供奉佛前。

sentences.english: Don't say that there is no true love, don't let others mistook you seen it all.
sentences.chinese: 别说这世间没有真爱，不要让别人误以为你阅人无数。

sentences.english: With the waiting depot, the arriving coffin, and the somber faces.
sentences.chinese: 这里是停柩所，是已运到的棺木，和无数阴沉的脸面。

sentences.english: And did you know that there are really zillions of ways to prepare a great seafood meal?
sentences.chinese: 你知道吗，准备一顿美好的海鲜大餐有无数种方法？

sentences.english: He won many hearts by his gallantry.
sentences.chinese: 他以勇敢赢得芳心无数。

sentences.english: King David's statue was made of bronze and it attracted many sculptors .
sentences.chinese: 大卫王的塑像是用青铜铸造的，吸引了无数的雕塑家。

sentences.english: He had ranked himself in the numerous phalanx of unbelievers.
sentences.chinese: 他一直象其它无数怀疑者一样持怀疑态度。
船后的水翻起无数个旋涡。

sentences.english: With the countless torches lit, with the silent sea of faces and the unbarred heads.
sentences.chinese: 无数火炬燃起，无数脸孔和致哀者汇集的沉默海洋。

sentences.english: With the countless torches lit, with the silent sea of faces and the unbarred heads.
sentences.chinese: 无数火炬燃起，无数脸孔和致哀者汇集的沉默海洋。

sentences.english: Look , I am very haleness! You are a enmity fetch among innumerability. Foolish and clumsiness are your epitaph.
sentences.chinese: 你是无数冤魂中的一个，愚蠢和笨拙是你的墓志铭。

sentences.english: Kongming chess is an intellective game with simple rules but changeable playing measures.
sentences.chinese: 孔明棋是一种玩法简单，但其中变化无数的益智游戏。

sentences.english: Compounding the problems of the quake aftermath will likely be the numerous aftershocks that accompany any major earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 震后的问题中可能还有伴随大震而来的无数余震。

definition: lit. their number cannot be counted (idiom); fig. countless/innumerable
lit. by the thousands and tens of thousands (idiom); untold numbers/innumerable/thousands upon thousands
lit. by the thousands and tens of thousands (idiom); untold numbers/innumerable/thousands upon thousands
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
(used for abstract things) a good deal, a lot of
